article.Heading: Budget 2016: Need FM to provide incentive to undertake R&D, says Mindtree
article.Summary: "I would anticipate the Budget to provide credit as well as incentives to do R&D so we can sustain our leadership position," says Mindtree CEO Krishnakumar Natarajan
article.Body:
Mindtree CEO Krishnakumar Natarajan is optimistic about the Indian IT sector but stressed on more focus on R&D. He says India has 56 percent market share of global outsourcing, but needs to encourage more R&D activities to maintain leadership.

He expects the Budget to lend a helping hand in this regard. "I would anticipate the Budget to provide credit as well as incentives to do R&D so we can sustain our leadership position."

He says the finance minister needs to look at it from the perspective that today the Indian IT industry is really the leader in the globe — hence, what needs to be done to really build a future for the industry, how to enhance current competitiveness and how to remove irritants.
